Reviews.Title: “FISH TANK”
Reviews.Author: charliecfc
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel night 5 miles o2 impressions bathroom nice shower water coming freezing smell described dirty fish tank sewage smell coming shower shower wasnt draining boyfriend reception complain hardly speak english unblock shower smell worse dirt hair deposits shower plug disgusting advised nasty smell coming shower answer bring bottle nasty smelling air freshener persisted water warm wasnt tv remote strange reason reception reluctant attitude didnt care gross washing hair sink couldnt close toilet door loo smell bad hear noise people walking corridors moving upstairs toilet door shut night fish tank smell didnt lucky actually missed breakfast morning cant imagine wash hair sink morning touching shower feel sick water freezing couldnt check quicker def wouldnt coming thinking staying hotel road please dont stay

Reviews.Content: booked stay hotel trip london o2 arena arrival placed adjoining building contained 4 flats stayed flat 2 absolutley disgusting avoid costs 1 bath towel couple 1 tea cup 2 tvs remote bathrooms overpowering smell sewage unpleasant wad dirty decorating hadnt finished tiles missing shower unit nice relaxing night stay sirens emergency night police ambulance etc etc didnt stop 5am stopped 10 minutes sleep top sleep quick shower freshen upbut hot water left avoid hotel costs cheap sake extra â£20 definitely stay elsewhere
